Docs.summary: Result from #checkOpNoThrow, #noteOpNoThrow, #startOpNoThrow: the given caller is not allowed to perform the given operation, and this attempt should cause it to have a fatal error, typically a SecurityException.

Docs.summary: Result from #checkOp, #noteOp, #startOp: the given caller is not allowed to perform the given operation, and this attempt should silently fail (it should not cause the app to crash).

The package name the uid belongs to
The proxied Context#createAttributionContext attribution tag or null for default attribution
A message describing the reason the op was noted
Docs.summary: Report that an application has started executing a long-running operation on behalf of another application when handling an IPC.
